set.name: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ A creature equipped with this gets "speed attacker". {DRAGSOLUTION}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if that attack is the second attack of this turn, after the attack, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is Dragsolutioned, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less. ■ While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is Dragsolutioned, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less. ■ While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this dragheart, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature battles with the equipped creature. ■ While battling, the creature equipped with this gets +3000 power. {DRAGSOLUTION}: When one of your creatures wins a battle, if it's the second time one of your creatures won a battle this turn, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ A creature equipped with this gets "speed attacker" and can't be destroyed while attacking. {DRAGSOLUTION}: When any of your Dragons attacks, if that is the second Dragon that attacked this turn, after the attack, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

card.name: Heart Burn, Battle General Galaxy Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Dragons gets "speed attacker". ■ Dragsolution: When one of your Dragons untaps, flip this to the Dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ A creature equipped with this gets "speed attacker". ■ Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Dragsolution: Whenever you put a Dragon during your turn, if it's not the first Dragon you put this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your hand. ■ Your opponent's non-Dragon creatures can't attack on the turn they are put.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your hand. ■ Your opponent's non-Dragon creatures can't attack on the turn they are put.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If the equipped creature is a fire draguner, that creature gets "speed attacker". ■ Whenever the equipped creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon or non-evolution Draguner, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. ■ Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the equipped creature is tapped, flip this dragheart over to the creature side and untap it. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature without paying its cost, you may have that creature battle this creature. ■ Triple this creature's power while battling a multicolored creature. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature without paying its cost, you may have that creature battle this creature. ■ Triple this creature's power while battling a multicolored creature. {HYPERSPATIAL DRAGHEART} ■ Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ You can't equip 2 or more weapons that have the same name to this creature. ■ When you put this creature, put any number of fire draghearts that have total cost the same as or less than the number of dragons in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) ■ 'Mana Arms 7': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, after the attack, flip all your draghearts to their creature side and untap them.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

card.name: Glenislay, Flame Dragon Ruler / "Help me! Malt!!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ Each turn, the first time this creature wins a battle, put a fire Dragheart Weapon that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (Equip it to this creature.) TWINPACT ■ Put a Draguner creature from your hand.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ Each turn, the first time this creature wins a battle, put a fire Dragheart Weapon that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (Equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Put a Draguner creature from your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

card.name: Glenglassaugh, Next Generation Dragon Ruler / "Leave this to me, big sister!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 2 or less. Then put a fire dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ If you have 2 or more dragons or draguners, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 2 or less. Then put a fire dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures. ■ If you have 2 or more dragons or draguners, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

card.name: Glenlivet, Explosive Dragon Ruler / "Explosive Secret Art, Raging Dragon's Earth!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature or when this creature is discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's cards, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a Dragon from among it and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, after you cast, add this spell to your hand instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature or when this creature is discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's cards, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a Dragon from among it and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, after you cast, add this spell to your hand instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have total cost the same as or less than the number of dragons in your mana zone and destroy them.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have no creatures, this creature costs up to 3 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} {MAGIBOMBER}(7) (Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a creature that costs 7 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.) ■ After this creature attacks, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {NINJA STRIKE} 7 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then if you have 3 or more fire Dragons in your mana zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD1 Legend Super Deck: Flaming Dragon Fighter
